revision.text:
{{unreliable sources|date=October 2012}} {{Infobox military conflict |conflict=First Battle of Lawdar |partof=[[Al-Qaeda insurgency in Yemen]] |image= |caption= |date= 19–25 August 2010
({{Age in months, weeks and days|month1=08|day1=19|year1=2010|month2=08|day2=25|year2=2010}}) |place= [[Lawdar]] ([[Abyan Governorate]]) |casus= The Yemeni armed forces regain control of Lawdar |status= Yemeni victory{{cite web|url=https://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5jaSuALY9MdZ5WSyhaw8CmEBh4DTw |title=AFP: Yemen army 'regains control' of southern town |publisher=Google.com |date=2010-08-25 |accessdate=2012-11-29}} *Yemeni armed forces regain control of Lawdar |combatant1={{flag|Yemen}} |combatant2={{Flag icon|South Yemen}} Al-Hirak Al-Janoubi{{cite web|url=http://mediarabe.info/spip.php?breve2576 |title=Yémen : l'armée renforce l'étau autour d'Al-Qaïda à Lawdar. Le Golfe redoute l'infiltration iranienne |publisher=Mediarabe.info |date=2007-10-02 |accessdate=2012-11-29}}
[[File:Flag of al-Qaeda.svg|24px]] [[al-Qaeda]] [[Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula|in the Arabian Peninsula]] |commander1= |commander2= |strength1= Unknown |strength2= [[South Yemen Movement]] : 200
[[Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula|Al-Qaeda]] : 200 |casualties1= 11-13 killed |casualties2= 19 killed |casualties3= 3 civilians killed, 33-35 people killed in total{{cite web|url=https://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5h_GlqXZNatmb0Tb6Wl58uVujS_Eg |title=AFP: Yémen du sud: l'armée reprend le contrôle de Loder |publisher=Google.com |date= |accessdate=2012-11-29}} }} {{Campaignbox Al-Qaeda insurgency in Yemen}} The '''First Battle of Lawdar''' refers to the [[Yemen]]i army offensive, launched between 19 and 25 August 2010 on the city of [[Lawdar]], that at the time was controlled by [[Al-Qaeda in the Arabian Peninsula]]. Several activists, including local leaders of Al Qaeda, were killed during the clashes. On 25 August, Yemeni authorities claimed to regain control.{{cite web|url=https://www.google.com/hostednews/afp/article/ALeqM5jaSuALY9MdZ5WSyhaw8CmEBh4DTw |title=AFP: Yemen army 'regains control' of southern town |publisher=Google.com |date=2010-08-25 |accessdate=2012-11-29}} ==References== {{Reflist}} {{coord|13|53|N|45|52|E|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:First Battle of Lawdar}} [[Category:Conflicts in 2010]] [[Category:Battles involving Yemen]] [[Category:2010 in Yemen]] [[Category:Abyan Governorate]] [[Category:Military operations involving Yemen]] {{Yemen-stub}}
